summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3806 for the improvement of the alley in block 11, Greene's Addition, being the alley between Boylston Avenue North to Franklin Avenue, from Louisa Street to East Lynn Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46848, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
